presentationColumns.name: Order Fill Rate
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of completely Fulfilled Sales Orders divided by the total number of submitted Sales Orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Order Fill Rate

presentationColumns.name: Order Line Fill Rate
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of completely Fulfilled Order Lines divided by the total number of  Order Fulfillment Lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Order Line Fill Rate

presentationColumns.name: Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of fulfillment lines with line category as order.

presentationColumns.name: Open Orders Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct order headers where orders are open.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Open Orders Count

presentationColumns.name: Open Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of fulfillment lines with line category of order and lines are open.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Open Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Return Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of fulfillment lines with line category as return.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Return Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Quantity Ordered
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of ordered quantity from lines.

presentationColumns.name: Reserved Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of reserved quantity from lines.

presentationColumns.name: RMA Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of RMA delivered quantity from lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.RMA Delivered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of cancelled quantity from lines.

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of shipped quantity from lines.

presentationColumns.name: Fulfilled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of fulfilled quantity from lines.

presentationColumns.name: Returned Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of returned quantity from lines.
